reference: Corcoran, Mary, and Christopher Jencks. The Effects of Family Background. Chapter 3 in Christopher Jencks et al., Who Gets Ahead? New York: Basic Books, 1979.

Hill, Martha S., and Michael Ponza. Does Welfare Dependency Beget Dependency? Unpublished, 1986.
McCarthy, Philip J. Pseudo-Replication: Half Samples. Review of the International Statistical Institute 37 (1969): 239-64.
Rein, Martin, and Lee Rainwater. Patterns of Welfare Use. Social Service Review 52 (December 1978): 511-34.
